meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting the first period of the Mesozoic era, between the Permian and Jurassic periods.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the triassic fossils to learn about ancient creatures.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a triassic exhibit showcasing prehistoric plants and animals.
meanings.sent3: The triassic rocks whispered tales of a time long gone.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she envisioned a triassic world filled with dinosaurs.
meanings.sent5: The triassic landscape painted a vivid picture of a bygone era.

meanings.definition: A rock formation or stratum from the Triassic period.
meanings.sent1: The geologist discovered a unique triassic formation in the desert.
meanings.sent2: Hikers marveled at the beauty of the colorful triassic rocks along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The triassic stratum seemed to play hide and seek with the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The triassic rocks stood like ancient sentinels guarding the secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the triassic layers felt like stepping back in time.
